channel.title: Distance from objects
channel.description:
im a bit rusty when it comes to objects, so i need.. slight help :P
is there a way to make.. such as targets, distance from them? i forget these things x.x

item.title: Distance from objects
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

hay bales dont work x.x i jus sit there like a lunatic lol

case 2514:
if (GoodDistance(objectX, objectY, absX, absY, 4) == true) {
if(actionTimer == 0) {
 if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 841 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 843 || 

playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 849 ||  playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 853 || 

playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 857 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214 || 

playerEquipment[playerWeapon]==861 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 839 || 

playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 845 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 847 || 

playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 851 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 855 || 

playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 857){
sendMessage("You shoot at the target.");
actionName = "range1";
actionTimer = 10;
setAnimation(426);
int offsetX = (absX - objectX) * -1;
int offsetY = (absY - objectY) * -1;
createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 249, 43, 31, 1);
addSkillXP((10000*playerLevel[4]), 4);
addSkillXP((5000*playerLevel[18]), 18);
updateRequired = true; 
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

else { sendMessage("You need a bow to shoot a target!");
}
}
}
break;

i dont know :\

Read full topic

item.title: Distance from objects
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

Search goodDistance in client.java, that should be all you need

If your trying to make a range just spawn a few hay bales to stop people from walking up to something

Read full topic
